verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: Glorious Lord, Thyself impart! Light of Light from God proceeding, open Thou our ears and heart, help us by Thy Spirit’s pleading, hear the cry Thy people raises, hear and bless our pray'rs and praises.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Father, Son, and Holy Ghost, praise to Thee and adoration! Grant that we Thy Word may trust and obtain true consolation while we here below must wander, till we sing Thy praises yonder.
